name: Elements Cube
description:
Elements Cube is a match-three puzzle game where you can forge elements and gather essence (points) based on the strength of the combo and elements forged.

The base elements are Air, Earth, Water and Fire, but if you combine them you can create new advanced elements: Plants, Ice, Thunder and Magma, which worth more essence.

The project was initially designed for mobile, but was redesigned for PC and a WebGL version for easy access. While the WebGL version is easier to access, the PC version has much better effects and performance.
